column2: an A.M. Eatery////I ordered the Breakfast Pot Pie while my friend got the Bravacado toast. The food came slightly slow
column3: but the restaurant was getting busy so it was understandable. The hash browns which accompanied my pot pie were the favorite part of my meal
column4: as they were very crispy and golden. The pot pie itself was good
column5: and the puff pastry portion was very flaky. On the other hand
column6: my friends Bravacado Toast had very hard bread. She did not enjoy the accompanying salad either. She said that the toast was good
column7: but she may have enjoyed another item such as the French Toast more. I've tried the French Toast from here before
column8: and it was delicious for those seeking a sweeter option.
